name: Hell`s Little Story
description: In the role of the young demon, you have to go through many of the most dangerous places imaginable: a cemetery, hell, abandoned monasteries and so on.

recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 or later Processor: Dual Core 3.0+ GHz or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
